# howto use ipoddisk


= Steps =

Note that this is highly *experimental* stuff:
  * download and unzip it
  * chmod a+x ipoddisk (if necessary)
  * plugin you iPod and make sure disk mode has been enabled
  * ./ipoddisk -oping_diskarb,volname=iPodDisk,fsname=iPodDisk mnt

PS: 
  * source code will be uploaded shortly.
  * it has *not* been tested on Intel Macs.
